original_text: My soul is weary of my life; I will leave my complaint upon myself; I will speak in the bitterness of my soul.
korean_text: 내 영혼이 살기에 곤비하니 내 불평을 토로하고 내 마음이 괴로운 대로 말하리라

sentences.original_text: My soul is weary of my life
sentences.korean_translation: 내 영혼이 내 삶에 지쳐 있구나

sentences.original_text: I will leave my complaint upon myself
I will speak in bitterness of my soul
